title: Theresa May – 2017 Florence Speech on Brexit
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Theresa May, the Prime Minister, on 22 September 2017 in Florence, Italy.

[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/theresamay-1.jpg)
